name: Deflect Arrows
text: You can knock arrows and other projectiles off course, preventing them from hitting you.
benefit: You must have at least one hand free (holding nothing) to use this feat. Once per round when you would normally be hit with an attack from a ranged weapon, you may deflect it so that you take no damage from it. You must be aware of the attack and not flat-footed. Attempting to deflect a ranged attack doesn't count as an action. Unusually massive ranged weapons (such as boulders or ballista bolts) and ranged attacks generated by natural attacks or spell effects can't be deflected.
staminaText: You can spend 5 stamina points to deflect an arrow while you’re flat-footed. You must still be aware of the attack.
mythicText: You deflect projectiles and ray spells with uncanny skill.
mythicBenefit: When using Deflect Arrows, you can def lect an additional number of ranged attacks per round equal to half your tier. You can expend one use of mythic power as an immediate action to def lect a single ray from a ray spell or effect targeting you.
text_zh: 你可以挡开飞来的箭和其他飞行物，防止它们命中你。
benefit_zh: 你必须至少空出一只手（没有拿任何东西）才能使用本专长。当你被远程武器击中时，每轮有一次机会挡掉而不受伤害。你必须察觉到该攻击，且不能处于措手不及状态。拨挡远程武器不算是一个动作。通常大型远程武器（例如巨石或弩炮巨矢）和源自天生攻击或法术效果的远程攻击无法被挡开。
mythicText_zh: 你能够以神秘的技巧偏转弹丸与射线法术。
mythicBenefit_zh: 当你使用拨挡飞箭专长时，每轮能够偏转额外数量次远程攻击，具体数量等同于你的阶层的一半。你能够以直觉动作花费1次神话之力，来偏转1条以你为目标且来自射线法术或效果的射线。
staminaText_zh: 花费5点耐力，你可以在措手不及时使用该专长。
